verses.verse: For the conclusion. By David. For a memorial, that the Lord hath saved me. GOD, draw near to my assistance: O Lord, make haste to help me.
Let them who seek my life be shamed and confounded; let them be turned back and put to shame who wish me evils.
Let them who say to me, Ha! Ha! be turned back suddenly, covered with shame.
Let all who seek thee exult, and rejoice for thee. Let them who love thy salvation, say continually, Let God be magnified.
As for me, I am afflicted and needy; God, assist me. Thou art my help and my deliverer: Lord, make no delay.
